name: FLUX (Broken Rib Studio)
description:
PERPIGNAN GAME JAM 2018 (48-HOUR JAM)3rd Place Winner

Challenge your memory playing this neon style game! Explore the darkest levels and remember the right path to save Cubie, he may get hurt!

THE TEAM

We are Broken Rib! A little students' team very passionated about videogames with lots of enthuthiasm and good vibes.
